image.alt: Bright, welcoming reception area at Chadwell Orthodontics with smiling team members

paragraphs.text: Chadwell Orthodontics provides the highest quality orthodontic care in a warm, relaxed and professional environment. Our mission is to deliver exceptional clinical results while making each visit fun, comfortable, and easy, from free consultations and insurance verification to flexible payment options and convenient appointment times.

We combine advanced orthodontic technology with a patient-first philosophy so every person receives personalized attention and outstanding service. Whether you prefer clear aligners or traditional braces, our team will design a treatment plan that fits your life.

items.title: Preferred Provider
items.text: We’re a preferred provider of modern clear-aligner systems, with training and experience in both adult and teen aligner options.

items.title: Financial Flexibility
items.text: Full-payment discounts, no-interest in-house financing, multi-family savings and complimentary insurance verification make treatment budgeting easier.

items.title: Convenient Hours
items.text: Before- and after-school blocks, alternating Mondays and Fridays, and early Wednesdays give families flexible options for visits.

items.title: Patient Experience
items.text: A patient-focused office with amenities like refreshments and Wi‑Fi, plus clear communication at every step for a seamless treatment journey.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Brandon Chadwell is committed to creating beautiful smiles by providing the highest quality of care in a fun, energetic environment. He earned his Doctor of Dental Medicine (DMD) at the Medical University of South Carolina and completed orthodontic specialty training at Children’s National Medical Center in Washington, DC. Dr. Chadwell treats each patient with personal attention and a focus on long-term results.
An active member of regional and national professional groups, Dr. Chadwell and his team prioritize clear communication, comfortable visits, and efficient treatment plans tailored to each family.

Dr. Rainey Chadwell is part of the Chadwell family and supports the practice’s patient-first approach. She shares a commitment to community involvement and compassionate care, helping ensure every patient feels comfortable and informed throughout treatment.
Clear aligners, traditional braces, retainers and adjunct appliances—our treatment options are designed to meet the needs of children, teens, and adults.

testimonials.author: Carol
testimonials.testimonial: “I live in Spartanburg and drive to Chadwell Orthodontics — the team here is so friendly, knowledgeable, and they made my son’s orthodontic experience amazing!”

image.alt: Bright, welcoming office with smiling Chadwell Orthodontics team welcoming patients

paragraphs.text: Our talented team welcomes you to Chadwell Orthodontics. We strive to make your orthodontic experience as memorable and rewarding as possible by providing advanced treatments with top quality care in a fun and comfortable atmosphere.

Our mission at Chadwell Orthodontics is to provide you with the highest quality of orthodontic treatment and unmatched customer service in a warm and relaxed yet professional ambiance. Dr. Chadwell believes in building positive relationships with our patients and taking the time to learn what is important to each family.
We offer a range of treatment options, including braces, the Damon® systems, and clear aligner therapy, to fit different needs and lifestyles while focusing on comfort and predictable results.

With amenities like a game room, coffee bar, complimentary Wi‑Fi and flexible scheduling — including before and after school times and early Wednesday openings — we make treatment convenient for families in Duncan and the surrounding communities.

Dr. Brandon Chadwell is committed to creating beautiful smiles by providing the highest quality of care in a fun and energetic environment. He treats each patient with personal attention while delivering exceptional service and lasting results.
Dr. Chadwell provides comprehensive orthodontic specialty services for children, teens and adults, including traditional braces, clear braces and clear aligner therapy.

image.alt: Dr. Brandon Chadwell consulting with a patient in the office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Chadwell earned his bachelor’s degree from the University of Tennessee, Knoxville and received his Doctor of Dental Medicine (DMD) from the Medical University of South Carolina in Charleston. He completed his orthodontic specialty training at Children’s National Medical Center in Washington, D.C.

He is affiliated with the Southern Association of Orthodontists, South Carolina Dental Association, American Association of Orthodontists, American Dental Association and the Spartanburg County Dental Society.

Outside the office, Dr. Chadwell enjoys time with his wife, Dr. Rainey Chadwell, and their son Harrison. He loves hiking, travel, photography, wakeboarding, snowboarding and golf, and the family enjoys time with their dogs and horses.

Dr. Chadwell is active in the Duncan community, sponsoring local schools, sports teams and youth activities. He believes that great people make great communities and looks forward to giving back through local involvement.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Chadwell is very active in Duncan and the surrounding communities and sponsors many local schools, sports teams and youth‑related activities. Dr. Chadwell believes that great people make great communities. We run contests, events and community activities and invite you to follow us on social to see what is happening.

image.alt: Virtual orthodontic consult background with smiling patient

paragraphs.text: Your first visit is where we begin. Expect a friendly meet-and-greet with our team, a complete oral exam and necessary X-rays, and a clear discussion of treatment options suited to your smile.
We’ll review your medical history, create a personalized treatment plan with estimated timing and costs, and walk through insurance and payment options so you leave confident about next steps.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We offer flexible payment options to make treatment affordable, including full-payment discounts, low down payments, and no-interest plans when available. Ask our treatment coordinator about what fits your budget.

Your treatment fee typically includes all routine visits, emergency care, one set of retainers, records and X-rays, and any appliances we prescribe. We will file insurance claims electronically to help you get the maximum benefit.

Before your appointment, please complete any health history or intake forms so we can provide safe, personalized care. If you prefer, you can request forms or bring completed copies to your first visit.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online
Schedule your consultation at Chadwell Orthodontics

og_meta.description: Start your journey at Chadwell Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access forms, and schedule a consultation or virtual screening.

image.alt: Foster Orthodontics mainstage background showing friendly office exterior

paragraphs.text: Traditional metal braces remain a reliable, cost-effective choice for treating a wide range of alignment issues. Small brackets and strong archwires steadily move teeth into healthier positions while our team monitors comfort and progress at every visit.

image.alt: Young patient smiling with metal braces

paragraphs.text: The Damon System uses self-ligating, tieless brackets that reduce friction and can make treatment more comfortable with fewer adjustments. Many patients appreciate the efficient biomechanics and fuller smile development the system can encourage.

Damon Clear combines tieless, low-profile brackets with advanced archwires to provide discreet, effective tooth movement. It’s a popular option for adults and teens who want the performance of the Damon System with a more subtle appearance.

image.alt: Patient smiling while wearing clear ceramic braces

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners are removable, nearly invisible trays that gradually reposition teeth using a series of customized aligners. They make daily oral hygiene easier and let you eat without bracket restrictions while we track your progress with digital scans.

Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses custom 3-D planning and removable clear aligners to treat a wide range of alignment issues with a discreet approach. It’s an excellent option for adults and teens seeking minimal impact on appearance while achieving predictable tooth movement.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligner on teeth

paragraphs.text: Spark Clear Aligners are an advanced clear-aligner system offered as an alternative to other aligner brands. They use precise digital planning and comfortable, translucent trays to help you reach your smile goals with discreet wear.

image.alt: Patient smiling after clear aligner treatment

paragraphs.text: We follow professional guidance to evaluate children early, often recommending an orthodontic screening by age seven to catch developing issues. Early or interceptive care can guide jaw growth, preserve space for erupting permanent teeth, and simplify later treatment when needed.

image.alt: Young child having an orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: After active treatment, custom retainers protect your new alignment and help maintain long-term results. We provide guidance on removable and fixed retainer options so your smile stays stable for years to come.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer and smiling

paragraphs.text: Find clear answers to common questions about treatments, scheduling, forms, and how to contact our team at Chadwell Orthodontics.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional metal and ceramic braces for children, teens, and adults, clear aligner therapy (including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>), and custom retainers to help keep your smile healthy after treatment.

image.alt: Happy family portrait in orthodontic office

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: The American Association of Orthodontists recommends an initial evaluation by age 7. Early checks let us monitor growth and recommend the right time to start treatment if needed.

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment time depends on your individual needs. Many patients finish care between 12 and 24 months. We’ll give a personalized timeline after your exam and diagnostic records.

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options to fit family budgets. Our team will review your benefits and explain financing during your visit.

image.alt: Patient reviewing financial options at desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Call or text our office at 864.486.1888, email info@chadwellsmiles.com, or request a visit online at https://chadwellsmiles.com/request-an-appointment/. We’ll help you find a time that fits your schedule.

accordion.header: Where can I find patient forms and accessibility information?

paragraphs.text: Patient forms and appointment details are available on our booking page at https://chadwellsmiles.com/request-an-appointment/. If you need assistance accessing website content, call 864.486.1888 or email info@chadwellsmiles.com and we will provide alternate access.
